title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
There is a difference of 14.0 between the maximum Copy Type Print and minimum Copy Type Digital.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
There is a difference of 14.0 between the maximum Copy Type Print and minimum Copy Type Digital.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
There is a difference of 14.0 between the maximum Copy Type Print and minimum Copy Type Digital.
Considered together, the average Number of copies in millions in all 2 Copy Types is roughly 22.0.
